openGraph.title: Best Android Development Course in India
openGraph.description: Our Android Development course takes you on a comprehensive journey on the Android Studio that starts from building the UI, to connecting to network services and launching your product on the Google Play Store.

overview.content:
There are close to 2 billion Android powered devices as of 2016, and for more than 200 million Indians Android is the primary platform for consumption of content. From social and communication apps like Whatsapp, Instagram and Snapchat to utilities like Uber, Swiggy and Paytm, Android enables companies to cater to their users 24x7.

Our Android App Development course takes you on a comprehensive journey with the Android Studio that starts from building the UI to connecting to network services and launching your product on the Google Play Store. Since most products look for both web and mobile presence these days, you'll be an in-demand Android Developer the day you graduate our Course.

courseHighlights.title: UI Design
courseHighlights.content: An app with great functionality must be complemented by top notch User Experience and a neat User Interface. Our course covers building both common and upcoming UI/UX patterns.

courseHighlights.title: Firebase & Push Notifications
courseHighlights.content: Firebase is Google's service that provides a real-time database and push notifications, so that you can send information to the user even when he is not using your app

courseHighlights.title: Hardware Sensors
courseHighlights.content: Sensors help us build context-aware apps. You'll learn how to use GPS location, orientation, speed sensors, and perform actions on gestures such as flip and shake.

courseHighlights.title: Network & Databases
courseHighlights.content: Most apps are connected in nature. You'll learn how to connect your apps to a backend to create an ecosystem of users and their data.

courseContents.title: Activities and UI
courseContents.description: The basic building blocks of an Android app - 'the Activity'. Learn to make beautifully designed apps, with all kinds of screen sizes and all types of layouts. Learn how to build 'ListViews' for showing lists of data, in the form of beautiful cards, common Android design patterns such as Navigation Drawer, Action Bar, Floating Action Buttons and all Material Design Concepts
points: Object Oriented Programming Concepts in Java and Kotlin
Getting Started with Android App Development Tools
Getting Familiar With Syntax of Kotlin

courseContents.title: Working with List of Data
courseContents.description: Not everything happens on the screen; learn to create services that run in the background. AsyncTasks use multi-threading to run parallel operations on separate threads so the user doesn't notice any work being done, and the app remains ever responsive.

courseContents.title: Data Storage
courseContents.description: The course will cover all three ways of local data storage available in Android.

courseContents.title: Network
courseContents.description: A mobile app is nothing without connectivity. Learn to add network connectivity and integrate your app with remote servers. the course will also cover how to use backend services like Firebase to create real-time databases and push notifications to create chat based applications.

courseContents.title: Firebase
courseContents.description: Learn to integrate the most widely used platform for Mobile Developers 'FIREBASE'.Add login functionality with PhoneNo,Gmail,Facebook with adding just a bunch of lines to your code.Get Hands on Machine Learning on Mobile and Sending Notifications Using Firebase.
points: Storing Data and fetching Data in Realtime
Add Login Feature Using Phone With Otp,Email,Gmail etc
Using MLkit for Machine Learning in Mobile

courseContents.title: Background Services And Architecture Patterns
courseContents.description: Learn to understand background services and Architecture Pattersn Techniques which are followed in industries

courseContents.title: Projects
courseContents.description: Students will get hands on knowledge of the underlying material by building several projects that use the techniques taught in this course to solve a real life problem.
points: Image classification and Object detection Using MLkit

faqs.ques: How much knowledge of Data Structures and Algorithms do I need to take this course?
faqs.ans: You need to have a good command on data structures such as Stacks, Queues and Lists as well as a basic idea of algorithms like sorting, searching and string manipulation. It is also imperative to have good conceptual understanding of Object Oriented Programming

faqs.ques: I have no idea of Java. Can I join ?
faqs.ans: That is not a problem if the aforementioned concepts are clear and you have coded in some other language like C++ before. We will cover the syntax of Java in the first couple of classes.

faqs.ques: Do you have a test for admission into this course ?
faqs.ans: Yes, we have a simple test covering OOP concepts, basic Data structures and array/string manipulation. You need to undertake that test while registering for Android App Development Course.

faqs.ques: Will there by any app development projects ?
faqs.ans: Definitely! No android app development course is complete without projects, and we focus a lot on working on live android app development projects and practical topics.
